TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyMetadata extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义依赖属性在应用于特定类型（包括该属性向其注册的条件）时行为的某些方面。

span.span: Defines certain behavior aspects of a dependency property as it is applied to a specific type, including conditions it was registered with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法时, 可以在依赖属性注册过程中定义和使用属性元数据 (或附加属性或只读依赖属性的变体), 或在调用方法。Property metadata can be defined and used during dependency property registration when calling the method (or variations for attached properties or read-only dependency properties), or after original owner registration when calling the method. 还使用属性元数据。 also takes property metadata. 此类是一个具体的基类, 可在每个调用中使用。This class is a concrete base class that can be used in each of these calls. 但是, 使用派生类之一 (如) 指定元数据是很常见的。However, it is very common to specify metadata using one of the derived classes such as . 这些派生类支持将更详细的元数据作为布尔属性值传递, 这对于检测或启用仅在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]框架级别实现的某些属性系统和布局行为很有用。These derived classes support more detailed metadata carried as Boolean property values, which are useful for either detecting or enabling some property system and layout behaviors that are only implemented at the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework level. 此类的多个属性是对对象模型的读写属性, 但只能在与属性系统操作 (如或 ) 中使用的实例之前写入。Several properties of this class are read-write to the object model, but can only be written prior to the instance being used in a property system operation such as or . 这些属性中的每一个都可能是由构造函数设置的, 但会公开, 以便方法实现可以对其进行设置。Each of these properties could also have been set by the constructor but are exposed so that method implementations can set them. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类型和此类型的成员通常不在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用。This type, and members of this type, are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: The default value to specify for a dependency property, usually provided as a value of some specific type.

summary.span: 使用此元数据将应用于的依赖项对象的指定默认值，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified default value for the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为`defaultValue`提供的值的类型必须是匹配的, 或者与此元数据将应用到的依赖属性的初始注册中指定的类型相关。The type of the value provided for `defaultValue` must be match or be related to the type specified in the original registration of the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to. 如果元数据默认值类型与其应用于依赖属性的类型不匹配, 则很难进行调试, 因为在编译期间不能检测到不匹配的情况 (不匹配会引发运行时异常)。Mismatches between metadata default value type and the type of the dependency property it is being applied to can be difficult to debug, because the mismatch is not detectable during compilation (the mismatch will raise a run-time exception). 尽管它是每个无参数构造函数的默认`defaultValue`设置 , 但不能指定的。Although it is the default per the parameterless constructor, a `defaultValue` of cannot be specified. 尝试这样做将引发异常。Attempting to do so will raise an exception. ## Examples [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#Initpm](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#initpm)] [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#PMCtor1param](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#pmctor1param)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供`defaultValue`的值的类型必须是匹配的, 或者与此元数据将应用到的依赖属性的原始注册中指定的类型相关。The type of the value provided `defaultValue` must be match or be related to the type specified in the original registration of the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to. 如果元数据默认值类型与其应用于依赖属性的类型不匹配, 则很难进行调试, 因为在编译期间不能检测到不匹配的情况 (不匹配会引发运行时异常)。Mismatches between metadata default value type and the type of the dependency property it is being applied to can be difficult to debug, because the mismatch is not detectable during compilation (the mismatch will raise a run-time exception). 尽管它是每个无参数构造函数的默认`defaultValue`设置 , 但不能指定的。Although it is the default per the parameterless constructor, a `defaultValue` of cannot be specified. 尝试这样做将引发异常。Attempting to do so will raise an exception. ## Examples [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#Initpm](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#initpm)] [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#PMCtor2param](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#pmctor2param)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要指定而不是, 可以为`propertyChangedCallback`参数传递`null` 。If you want to specify a but not a , you can pass `null` for the `propertyChangedCallback` parameter. 为`defaultValue`提供的值的类型必须是匹配的, 或者与此元数据将应用到的依赖属性的初始注册中指定的类型相关。The type of the value provided for `defaultValue` must be match or be related to the type specified in the original registration of the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to. 如果元数据默认值类型与其应用于依赖属性的类型不匹配, 则很难进行调试, 因为在编译期间不能检测到不匹配的情况 (不匹配会引发运行时异常)。Mismatches between metadata default value type and the type of the dependency property it is being applied to can be difficult to debug, because the mismatch is not detectable during compilation (the mismatch will raise a run-time exception). 尽管它是每个无参数构造函数的默认`defaultValue`设置 , 但不能指定的。Although it is the default per the parameterless constructor, a `defaultValue` of cannot be specified. 尝试这样做将引发异常。Attempting to do so will raise an exception. ## Examples [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#Initpm](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#initpm)] [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#PMCtor3param](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#pmctor3param)]

summary.span: 获取或设置对此元数据中所指定 实现的引用。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to a implementation specified in this metadata.
A implementation reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性元数据中的回调通常不是包含类型上的公共成员, 因此, 此属性的值对于只使用现有依赖属性的元数据的大多数方案而言并不重要。The callbacks in property metadata are not typically public members on the containing type, so the value of this property is not important for most scenarios that just consume an existing dependency property's metadata. 此属性被公开的一个原因是, 如果基本元数据和重写/添加元数据都指定, 则元数据子类可以执行其所需的合并逻辑。One reason this property is exposed is so that metadata subclasses can perform their desired merge logic if both base metadata and overriding/adding metadata specify a . 但是, 的默认合并逻辑是替换前一个逻辑。However, the default merge logic for a is to replace the previous one. 在对象模型中定义为读写。 is defined in the object model as read-write. 这样就可以在对象本身初始化后进行调整。This is so can be adjusted after initialization of the object itself. 但是, 在调用、 或的过程中使用元数据后, 属性系统将密封该元数据实例, 并且属性现在被视为不可变。However, once the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and the properties are now considered immutable. 如果尝试设置一次`true` , 此元数据实例将引发异常。Attempting to set once is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception.

exception.span: 将元数据属性应用于依赖属性操作后，无法设置该属性。

span.span: Cannot set a metadata property once it is applied to a dependency property operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对象模型中定义为读写。 is defined in the object model as read-write. 这样就可以在对象本身初始化后进行调整。This is so can be adjusted after initialization of the object itself. 但是, 在调用、 或的过程中使用元数据后, 属性系统将密封该元数据实例, 并且属性现在被视为不可变。However, once the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and the properties are now considered immutable. 如果尝试设置一次`true` , 此元数据实例将引发异常。Attempting to set once is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. 尽管它是每个无参数构造函数的默认`defaultValue`设置 , 但不能使用或构造函数来设置的。Although it is the default per the parameterless constructor, a `defaultValue` of cannot be set using either or the constructor. 尝试这样做将引发异常。Attempting to do so will raise an exception. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类型的成员通常不在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用。Members of this type are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值确定是否已通过某种方式将元数据应用于属性，从而导致该元数据实例变为不可变状态。

span.span: Gets a value that determines whether the metadata has been applied to a property in some way, resulting in the immutable state of that metadata instance.

value.span: 如果元数据实例不可变，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the metadata instance is immutable; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的各种属性( 例如) 在对象模型中定义为读写。Various properties of , such as , are defined in the object model as read-write. 这就是在初始化对象本身后可以调整这些属性。This is so those properties can be adjusted after initialization of the object itself. 但是, 在对、 或的调用中, 将元数据应用于依赖属性后, 属性系统将密封该元数据实例, 并且属性现在被视为不可变。However, once the metadata is applied to a dependency property as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and the properties are now considered immutable. 在其中一个调用时, 将调用, 并将此属性的值设置为。 `true`At the time of one of these calls, is called, and the value of this property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例在自定义元数据属性的 set 操作之前进行检查。The following example checks prior to a set operation of a custom metadata property. [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#MergeImpl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#mergeimpl)]

param.span: 要与此实例的值合并的基元数据。

span.span: The base metadata to merge with this instance's values.

param.name: dp
param.span: 要应用此元数据的依赖项对象。

span.span: The dependency property to which this metadata is being applied.

summary.span: 将此元数据与基元数据合并。

span.span: Merges this metadata with the base metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在重写元数据 (方法) 的内部使用。This method is used internally when metadata is being overridden ( method). ## Examples 下面的示例为自定义元数据类型实现合并, 该类型将附加属性添加到属性元数据。The following example implements a merge for a custom metadata type that adds an additional property to the property metadata. [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#MergeImpl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#mergeimpl)]

para.span: 派生自的类实现应重写此方法, 以考虑它们在实现中添加的任何元数据属性。

span.span: Class implementations that derive from should override this method to account for any metadata properties they have added in their implementations.

para.span: 例如, 你的实现可能已添加了一个新的 flagwise 枚举值, 然后实现应能够正确组合这些标志。

span.span: For instance, your implementation might have added a new flagwise enumeration value, and the implementation should then be able to combine those flags correctly.

para.span: 在实现代码之前始终调用基实现, 因为基实现负责合并已在该类型上定义的所有属性。

span.span: Always call the base implementation prior to your implementation code, because the base implementation takes care of merging all the properties already defined on the type.

para.span: 合并的确切行为取决于你。

span.span: The exact behavior of the merge is up to you.

para.span: 您可以选择将值组合在一起, 如果派生的元数据保留为默认值, 则恢复为基值, 或者根据添加到特定元数据类的属性类型及其含义, 恢复为其他许多行为。

span.span: You could choose to have values combined, revert to base value if the derived metadata were left at the default, or many other behaviors based on the types of properties you have added to your particular metadata class, and their meanings.

summary.span: 当此元数据已经应用到一个属性时（这表明正在密封元数据）调用。

span.span: Called when this metadata has been applied to a property, which indicates that the metadata is being sealed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子类应该确保调用后 , 子类的数据结构的任何可变性都应该标记为不可变。Subclasses should assure that any mutability of the data structure of a subclass should be marked as immutable once is called. 一旦将元数据应用于属性系统操作 (注册、添加所有者、重写元数据), 就会调用此参数。This will be called once the metadata is applied to a property system operation (register, add owner, override metadata).

summary.span: 获取或设置对此元数据中所指定 实现的引用。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to a implementation specified in this metadata.
A implementation reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性元数据中的回调通常不是定义类型上的公共成员, 因此, 此属性的值对于只使用现有依赖属性的元数据的大多数方案并不重要。The callbacks in property metadata are not typically public members on the defining type, so the value of this property is not important for most scenarios that just consume an existing dependency property's metadata. 此属性被公开的一个原因是, 如果基本元数据和重写/添加元数据都指定, 则元数据类可以执行其所需的合并逻辑。One reason this property is exposed is so that metadata classes can perform their desired merge logic if both base metadata and overriding/adding metadata specify a . 的默认合并逻辑是维护表中的所有实现, 并通过在层次结构中第一个运行的最深层类建立回调来调用每个实现。The default merge logic for is to maintain all implementations in a table and call each of them, with callbacks established by the deepest class in hierarchy running first. 在对象模型中定义为读写。 is defined in the object model as read-write. 这样就可以在对象本身初始化后进行调整。This is so can be adjusted after initialization of the object itself. 但是, 在调用、 或的过程中使用元数据后, 属性系统将密封该元数据实例, 并且属性现在被视为不可变。However, once the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and the properties are now considered immutable. 如果尝试设置一次`true` , 此元数据实例将引发异常。Attempting to set once is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception.

exception.span: 将元数据属性应用于依赖属性操作后，无法设置该属性。

span.span: Cannot set a metadata property once it is applied to a dependency property operation.
